_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Snow! We've received 4 inches of new snow in the last 24 hours, including 2 inches overnight. The storm will continue to hit us this morning, with another few inches of snow possible. Apex Express and Moonbeam Express may be delayed this morning as patrol conducts avalanche mitigation work. Sunrise chairlift is now open! Sunrise terrain is ungroomed and limited to North Star and Lower Dynamite. Do not duck ropes into closed terrain, no matter how tempting. Unseen hazards exist and you will lose your pass for at least 30 days (at all Ikon Pass resorts). Due to early season conditions, there is no beginner terrain accessible from Moonbeam Express. Fleet Street is the only route down from Apex Express and should be considered experts only. Please check your speed and be aware of other skiers and riders. Holiday fun continues! A DJ will be spinning outside Moonbeam Lodge throughout the weekend. Join us at the Solitude Nordic & Snowshoe Center tonight for our first Nordic Nights of the season.

_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Know The Code, limit your speed, and stay in control while skiing and riding.
